++ King Medresh Sarnak

King Medresh Sarnak was of the ancient Sarnak tribe of [Kunark] who rules in [Kalas]. His skeleton wears incredibly aged but regal clothes, his jewelry and crown still as good as the day they were buried (due to enchantment). 

His skeleton sports three long fingers with claws at the end of each, elongated arms, and a skull that has a more profound snout compared to the modern day Iksar. 

      Coffin has ehterium inlay (enchanted to help preserve the dead inside)
      Golden Crown
      Golden Necklace (worth 1000g)
      Ring of command fire elemental
